channel.title: Changing how often char is saved on server

item.title: Changing how often char is saved on server
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Thats because its set setting smitimer to 1, it decreasing it by one, hence the -=.

smitimer -= 1;

You have to actually find where smitimer is initialized to something, and then making that value higher will increase the time between saves.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how often char is saved on server

item.title: Changing how often char is saved on server
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

i want to make is so “saved” will show on server (CMD) every 20 seconds not every 7 seconds. how can i do that.

smitimer -= 1; if (smitimer <= 1) { savechar(); println_debug(""); savemoreinfo(); println_debug(""); if (savemoreinfo()) { println_debug("SAVED");

Read full topic
